Description of incident: Pacific BioSciences of California Inc. has notified patients of a data breach when an employee laptop was stolen from their home that contained some of their personal information.The information included names, birthdates, and Social Security numbers.The company has arranged credit monitoring services through AllClearID for one year at no charge. For those affected they can call 1-866-979-2595. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-46702
